item.title: T-SQL Tuesday #96: Folks Who Have Made a Difference
item.description: This post is a part of T-SQL Tuesday series started by Adam Machanic in 2009. Ewald Cress (b | t) asked to give a shout-out to people (well-known or otherwise) who have made a meaningful contribution to your life in the world of data. As I was thinking about the people that had the most impact on my career I have to give the biggest kudos to my friend, Leszek Kwa≈õniewski (t).
